title: PES girls hostel
content: Are shorts really not allowed in the PES girls hostel? What if you're going out?

comments.body:
Forget girls hostel, in the RR boys hostel they don't allow you. xD

You can wear whatever in your room, but you're supposed to follow dress code wherever security guards are present, like some hallways and when you enter/exit. 

I usually carry shorts in my bag when I really want to wear them, or I wear them in my room after attendance. 

I guess this doesn't really answer the girls hostel question, I can ask friends if you want. ðŸ˜‚
Ah thanks, I figure it'll be worse for girls.

In the girls hostel you are allowed to wear shorts inside the hostel freely..

I don't think you are allowed to wear it as you go outside

You can wear shorts as long as you're not in the common areas like dining room or the study area. And the security usually reports you to the warden if you're found going out with shorts or "inappropriate" outfits
Hey! Are you a student currently? I wish to avail girls hostel this year, could you give me an idea/review?
its honestly not worth it...for 1L for 10 months the food is mid, plus the 7pm curfew realllllllllly gets to you
